data.question: What is the empirical formula of Zr-bcu-tmuc?
At what temperature were the crystallographic data for Zr-bcu-26ndc collected?
What is the crystal system and space group of Zr-bcu-22bipy44dc?
Is the absorption correction applied for Zr-bcu-tmuc?
data.answer: No, absorption correction was not applied.

data.question: What is the volume of the unit cell for Zr-bcu-azo33?
What method was used for the refinement of Zr-bcu-26ndc?
What is the final R index for Zr-bcu-tmuc when I>2sigma(I)?
Does the structure of Zr-bcu-22bipy44dc have a higher calculated density compared to Zr-bcu-tmuc?
data.answer: False, Zr-bcu-tmuc has a calculated density of 0.918 Mg/m3, and Zr-bcu-22bipy44dc has a calculated density of 0.693 Mg/m3.

data.question: What is the theta range for data collection for Zr-bcu-azo33?
Is the BET area for Zr-bcu-tmuc greater than 600 m2/g?
data.answer: True, the BET area for Zr-bcu-tmuc is 640 m2/g.

data.question: What is the wavelength used for the crystallographic data collection of Zr-bcu-26ndc?
What is the largest difference peak for Zr-bcu-tmuc?
Was the structure of Zr-bcu-azo33 solved by direct methods?
data.answer: True, the structure was solved by direct methods.

data.question: What is the F(000) value for Zr-bcu-22bipy44dc?
Does Zr-bcu-26ndc have a larger unit cell volume compared to Zr-bcu-tmuc?
data.answer: True, Zr-bcu-26ndc has a unit cell volume of 7030(4) A3, and Zr-bcu-tmuc has a unit cell volume of 4991.3 Å3.

data.question: What is the crystal size of Zr-bcu-azo33?
What is the theta range for data collection for Zr-bcu-tmuc?
Is the crystal system for Zr-bcu-tmuc tetragonal?
data.answer: True, the crystal system for Zr-bcu-tmuc is Tetragonal.
